Title: How to Lead People and Manage Your Business’s Money
Description:
Today, we hear from:

  • A business owner wondering how to correct a team member without micromanaging
  • A general manager asking how to catch up when he falls behind with vendors
  • A business owner wondering if she should change her business from an LLC to an S corporation to pay less in taxes
  • A business owner who is determining the right pay and benefits for her team
  • A physical therapist who is wondering if she should buy the business from her boss
